title: Dr. Dennis Ulbrich
text:
Email
  
  
    
     Phone
  

  
  






Contact address





Hochschule Bremen Fakultät 4  Flughafenallee 10 28199 Bremen
ZIMT, Office 236



Hochschule Bremen, ZIMT (© Sven Stolzenwald)







Since February 2025, I am working as a postdoctoral researcher at Faculty 4 (ZIMT) of the Bremen University of Applied Sciences within the research group of Prof. Patrick Draheim.
Beforehand, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the Institute for Analysis and Numerics at the University of Münster; I was supervised by Prof. Marlies Pirner.
I earned my PhD degree in Mathematics (Dr. rer. nat. in Mathematics) at the University of Bremen under the supervision of Prof. Jens Rademacher and Prof. Marc Keßeböhmer, cf. MGP.

title: Dr. Dennis Ulbrich
text:
Since February 2025, I am working as a postdoctoral researcher at Faculty 4 (ZIMT) of the Bremen University of Applied Sciences within the research group of Prof. Patrick Draheim.
Beforehand, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the Institute for Analysis and Numerics at the University of Münster; I was supervised by Prof. Marlies Pirner.
I earned my PhD degree in Mathematics (Dr. rer. nat. in Mathematics) at the University of Bremen under the supervision of Prof. Jens Rademacher and Prof. Marc Keßeböhmer, cf. MGP.

title: Research
text:
Ordinary and partial differential equations and their dynamics
Dynamical Systems and Ergodic Theory
Kinetic Theory and Entropy methods
Boltzmann equation and its BGK-type approximations
Long-time behavior of solutions (Hypocoercivity)
Models of chemical reactions
Physical applications
